Carnage/ Dinobot

* Carnage sighed and shook her head as she saw Tankoor fall off to the side 
in surprise, she growled and looked at the Predacon drone...*

" Oh, for slag's sake! Get up and fight!"

************************************************************

* Dinobot snarled in anger as he saw Megatron's signature enter into a room, 
he followed the ventilation system until he came around a corner and saw 
Liono and Tigerhawk duck on either side of the door.
It was in that room beyond the commander and second-in-command that his 
target layed, the very target that would now be tasting the two bot's wrath.
So, they had it under what control there could be.
Dinobot then turned back towards the front of the ship, there was no real 
point to kill an enemy right away...there would be nothing to do later.:)
He slowly made his way towards the front of the ship when the floor suddenly 
felt wet underneath his feet, he looked down at what he had guessed was 
water...but was really mech fluid!
Dinobot looked around and saw the source of the mega-puddle...it was Suukie!
He growled as he put his rifle down and walked over to the bot that now 
layed on the floor, he shook his head and pulled the sword from it's 
chest-plate. The vital signs were weak but still functional, this bot was 
still alive.
Dinobot glared down at Suukie, the very bot that had opened fire upon 
Tavatron and himself.He held the sword in his hand and pondered the fact 
that if he should save this bot...who had saved his own life. But he knew 
that his debt was repaied so he did not owe this being anything but his 
wrath for firing upon him, the real questioned remained...should he save his 
life or let his rot?!
Dinobot growled and looked towards the doors...or what was left of them, he 
knew what it was like to die, to lie on one's back and KNOW that he would 
never see the sun rise the next day.
He sighed as he looked back at the bot laying on the floor in front of him, 
no bot deserved to die in a way that left the memory of a madman.
Dinobot leaned down and picked up Suukie, now it was HIS turn to owe 
something.
As he placed Suukie in a CR chamber he knew what he felt, suicide was the 
cowards way out. It signaled that that bot was not brave enough to face his 
problems and thus killed himself and left his problems unfinished, but if 
one accepted the responsibility of one's actions then their memory was worth 
remembering.
Dinobot closed the CR chamber hatch and began to walk towards the head of 
the ship again, now it was HIS turn to face those consequences...of war.
He picked up his rifle and walked out of the Ark, just in time to see a 
whole wad of poison heading for Tavatron!
He snarled and fired his rifle at the poison's sender just before he ran 
forward and in front of Tavatron.
With his tail he swiped most of the poison away but it left a throbbing pain 
in his tail where it came into contact with the gunk, the remainder of the 
poison hit him square in the chest-plate!
Dinobot nearly dropped his gun at the pain the poison sent rippling through 
his body, if his armor would have still been blue it would have turned grey 
with the pain.
He snarled and nearly found himself on his knees, it was a great risk to 
have done what he did but it had happened and there was nothing that he 
could do about it now! Besides, even if he could turn back time he would 
have done the same thing...the reason? He didn't know.
Dinobot looked up at the poison's sender he bared his teeth in rage and 
pain...*

" You will...harm no more...Maximals today, Predacon!"


(Carnage: Sorry about the moding with Suukie but the Maximals are 
outnumbered and they need all of the help that they can get. If CODE has a 
problem with this please contact me but not on the NBW posts, just my 
personal address. Thank you.)
